description: First occurrence from iterated procedure 'composite k added to sum of its prime factors reaches a prime' yielding n skipped primes.
mathematica: a[n_]:=Length[Select[Range[n+1,NestWhile[#+Total[Times@@@FactorInteger[#]]&,n,!PrimeQ[#]&]-1],PrimeQ]]; t={38400}; Do[i=4; While[a[i]!=k,If[PrimeQ[i+1],i+=2,i++]]; AppendTo[t,i],{k,57}]; t (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jun 01 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Sep 15 1999.
